alert.note: Alert for White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 29 at 1:06PM MST until October 01 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM SATURDAY TO 10 AM MST SUNDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, south winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, south winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...The White Mountains. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 10 AM Saturday to 10 AM MST Sunday. For the High Wind Watch, from Sunday morning through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
